nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overriden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropiate to concatenate
behavior.
nodes.name: KVTCrowdsale
TokenPurchase

arguments.value: rate must be greater than 0
wallet address must exist
token address must exist

nodes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
nodes.name: buyTokens
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase

nodes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
nodes.name: _forwardFunds
_getTokenAmount

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the beneficiary cannot be the zero address"

arguments.value: the beneficiary cannot be the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the beneficiary cannot be the zero address"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the weiAmount must not be zero"

arguments.value: the weiAmount must not be zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the weiAmount must not be zero"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the beneficiary must be a valid purchaser"

arguments.value: the beneficiary must be a valid purchaser

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the beneficiary must be a valid purchaser"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the crowdsale must not yet be finalized"

arguments.value: the crowdsale must not yet be finalized

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the crowdsale must not yet be finalized"

nodes.name: _preValidatePurchase

nodes.documentation: @dev The KVT Crowdsale uses adminstrators to handle updating the rate
nodes.name: isAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Set an administrator as the owner, using Open Zepplin RBAC implementation
nodes.name: setAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Remove an administrator as the owner, using Open Zepplin RBAC implementation
nodes.name: removeAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Purchasers must complete KYC before being able to participate in the public sale
nodes.name: isPurchaser

nodes.documentation: @dev Add a purchaser to the contract
nodes.name: setPurchaser

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the requester cannot approve a price change"

arguments.value: the requester cannot approve a price change

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the requester cannot approve a price change"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the price change must not be zero"

arguments.value: the price change must not be zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the price change must not be zero"

arguments.value: the crowdsale is already finalized

nodes.documentation: @dev Approve the end of the crowdsale
nodes.name: requestFinalize

arguments.value: the crowdsale is already finalized

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the crowdsale finalization has not been requested"

arguments.value: the crowdsale finalization has not been requested

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the crowdsale finalization has not been requested"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the crowdsale cannot be finalized by the requester"

arguments.value: the crowdsale cannot be finalized by the requester

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the crowdsale cannot be finalized by the requester"

nodes.documentation: @dev Approve the end of the crowdsale
nodes.name: approveFinalize

nodes.documentation: @dev On finalization, remaining tokens are moved back to the owner
nodes.name: finalization
